item.title: Everyone has to serve somebody, but software has to serve more than one
item.description: When people get paid to write software, we very often find some form of friction between the people that build the software and those that pay to have it built. The company I joined three years ago was no exception. When I joined, they had just launched three months ago, weren’t seeing any return on investment and prospects weren’t too bright either. I won’t lie, that first year was quite stressful.
